infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: PureNav needs to access you location to suggest routes to you based on you current location and to notify you when there are road closures along your road.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: PureNav needs to access you location to suggest routes to you based on you current location and to notify you when there are road closures along your road.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: PureNav needs to access you location to suggest routes to you based on you current location and to notify you when there are road closures along your road.
